Name: My Yandere is a Futanari
About the game: A girl from work seems to have a crush on you. Well, to be perfectly honest, it's a little more than that. You might just have a full-blown crazy--prone to violence--admirer on your hands... dare I say, Yandere? Careful, there might be a surprise waiting for you around any corner. Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions. Gameplay Kinetic Visual Novel H-Scenes Sexy Voice Acting ~5K words Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.
